short_description_localized.en: Designed with contemporary style and inviting warm tones, the Metropolitan Suites are located on the second floor, with 284-473 square feet of space and choice amenities.
short_description_localized.es: Designed with contemporary style and inviting warm tones, the Metropolitan Suites are located on the second floor, with 284-473 square feet of space and choice amenities.

description_localized.en:
Relax in the evenings and awake refreshed in this plush second-floor suite with all the amenities of home.  

Check in and breeze up to the second floor to discover a superior Manhattan retreat. Our Metropolitan Suites offer kitchenettes, luxe amenities, thoughtful conveniences and 284-473 square feet of space for the most comfortable stay.
description_localized.es:
Relax in the evenings and awake refreshed in this plush second-floor suite with all the amenities of home.  

Check in and breeze up to the second floor to discover a superior Manhattan retreat. Our Metropolitan Suites offer kitchenettes, luxe amenities, thoughtful conveniences and 284-473 square feet of space for the most comfortable stay.

images.name: Metropolitan-Suite--Metropolitan-Bedroom---Partial-View
images.caption: Metropolitan Bedroom - Partial View
images.description: This suite includes a queen bed, TV, and a window.
images.alt: A comfortable queen size bed nestled to the left of a nightstand accompanied by a lamp and clock radio. To the left of the bed a window sitting just to the right of a TV fixed to the wall.

images.name: Metropolitan-Suite--Metropolitan-Kitchenette---View-from-Sleeper-Sofa
images.caption: Metropolitan Kitchenette - View from Sleeper Sofa
images.description: This kitchenette includes a dishwasher, fridge, and a sink.
images.alt: Just to the right of the wall you will find a sink. To the right of the sink a dishwasher built into the cabinets. Above the cabinets, you will see additional mirrored cabinets of which a microwave is contained. In front of the kitchenette, a table and lamp sit just to the right of the sleeper sofa.

images.name: Metropolitan-Suite--Metropolitan-Bath---Partial-View
images.caption: Metropolitan Bath - Partial View
images.description: The Bathroom includes a full mirror, sink, and plenty of counter space.
images.alt: The Bathroom includes a full mirror sitting on a counter the length of the wall. In front of the counter, a round sink with additional counter space.

images.name: Metropolitan-Suite--Metropolitan-Studio-sofa-view
images.caption: Metropolitan Studio sofa view
images.description: The sofa bed with table mirror above and standing lamp. The sofa bed is next to the queen bed.
images.alt: The sofa bed with table mirror above and standing lamp. The sofa bed is next to the queen bed.
